articles.author: Cheyenne Haslett
articles.title: Opill, first over-the-counter birth control pill, will go on sale later this month - ABC News
articles.description: The pill was cleared by the FDA for use without a prescription last July.
articles.content: Opill, the first over-the-counter birth control pill that can be purchased without a prescription, will be available later this month online and in pharmacies for $19.99 a month, $49.99 for a three-month supply.

articles.title: BYD fires the latest shot in China's EV price war with 12% price cut
articles.description: The latest version of BYD's Yuan Plus starts at about $16,600, which is about 12% less than its predecessor.
articles.content:
The latest version of BYD's best-selling Yuan Plus has gone on sale in China starting at about 120,000 yuan, or about $16,600, making it roughly 12% cheaper than its predecessor.

articles.title: Electric cars on the rise in the Israeli market
articles.description: New car deliveries in February recorded the smallest drop since the outbreak of the war. Hyundai, Kia, Toyota, Skoda, and BYD are Israel's leading car brands.
